title: Received a Mystery Gift from Riot...
body:
Well, I'm not sure if it's for participating in that piltover event (because I think I already had the rewards previously), or for any other reason. Either way, I don't know what I received (if anything at all) because it didn't show me what I got.

So my questions are : what was it for ? (I haven't had time to log in since the 18th of January)

And what was it/How can I find out what it was?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like we sent you the Poro King Icon for participating in at least one Poro King match during our Snowdown Event!

Mystery Solved! ^.^
